data.oai_dc:dc: Number of cooperator and cheater per fruiting body

Number of spores belonging to cooperator genotype (column 4: GJV1) and cheater genotype(column 3:OC) per fruiting body (column 2: FB) and per independent experiment (column 1: Exp). Log values for cooperator and cheater are also presented (Log.GJV1 and Log.OC respectively)
